name: 🔪 Throw io - Online io game with Axes and Knives
name_original: 🔪 Throw io - Online io game with Axes and Knives
description:
Throw io  - is a new online io game with realtime battles with other players worldwide! You will enjoy this game if you love other online io games!

Throw axe if you are a real warrior!
Throw knives if you want to slash anyone!
Throw shurikens if you are a nimble ninja!
Throw daggers if you want to be a big hunter!

How to Play:
- Move your Hero by moving a joystick.
- Collect gems to grow up.
- Press Fire button to throw axe.
- Be accurate to hit enemy heroes with an axe.
- Be quick to dodge a thrown axe.

Features:
- Huge weapons collection with different features. Collect and try them all!
- Online io game with lots of fun and addictive gameplay!
- Lots of pixel-heroes for any taste. Try to unlock them all!
- Beat other players in the worldwide leaderboard!
- Each weapon has unique abilities set!
- Throw axes all day and all night!

There are more than 40 axes, knives, daggers and shurikens in Throw io!
There are more than 20 heroes in Throw io!

Throw axes, knives, daggers and shurikens:
Each weapon has a unique abilities set.
Poison attack puts a debuff on the enemy. 
Player with a debuff takes one more damage after a few seconds.
Bonus life chance gives you a better chance to get a bonus life after a 
kill.
Your weapon will fly through the enemies with a special ability.
With Bonus speed you will throw the weapon faster!
With Bonus distance you will throw the weapon further!
You will get a better reward with a Bonus reward ability.
You can throw two or even three knives at once with a special throw ability!

Knights, Zombies, Barbarians, Demons, Warriors and The King:
- There are more than 20 unique pixel heroes!
- More heroes you unlock - more rewards you will get!
- Heroes from the brainless zombies to the combat warriors!

Optimized for mobile!
- Throw io gives you awesome experience on mobile device.
- This is online io game, so you need internet connection to play.

You can spend two minutes or a few hours with this fun and addictive online io game! Join the battle and throw axes!
